update service_provider set service_provider_name = #{serviceProviderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_number = #{contactNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, service_content = #{serviceContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, average_price = #{averagePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sales = #{sales,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rating = #{rating,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, region = #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_hours = #{businessHours,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_url = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recommend = #{recommend,jdbcType=INTEGER} where spid = #{spid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
(SELECT * FROM service_provider WHERE (service_provider_name LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR service_content LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" OR description LIKE "%" #{keyword}"%" OR address LIKE "%" #{keyword}"%") and spid IN (select spid from service_provider
or service_content LIKE "%"#{filter0}"%"
or service_content LIKE "%"#{filter1}"%"
or service_content LIKE "%"#{filter2}"%"
or service_content LIKE "%"#{filter3}"%"
or service_content LIKE "%"#{filter4}"%"
or service_content LIKE "%"#{filter5}"%"
or service_content LIKE "%"#{filter6}"%"
or service_content LIKE "%"#{filter7}"%"
or service_content LIKE "%"#{filter8}"%"
or service_content LIKE "%"#{filter9}"%"
or service_content LIKE "%"#{filter10}"%"
or service_content LIKE "%"#{filter10}"%"
)) UNION SELECT * FROM service_provider WHERE spid IN ((SELECT DISTINCT service_provider_id FROM service WHERE service_name LIKE "%"#{keyword}"%" AND service_provider_id IN (select spid from service_provider
or service_content LIKE "%"#{filter0}"%"
or service_content LIKE "%"#{filter1}"%"
or service_content LIKE "%"#{filter2}"%"
or service_content LIKE "%"#{filter3}"%"
or service_content LIKE "%"#{filter4}"%"
or service_content LIKE "%"#{filter5}"%"
or service_content LIKE "%"#{filter6}"%"
or service_content LIKE "%"#{filter7}"%"
or service_content LIKE "%"#{filter8}"%"
or service_content LIKE "%"#{filter9}"%"
or service_content LIKE "%"#{filter10}"%"
or service_content LIKE "%"#{filter10}"%"
)))
